column2: Chesapeake faces enduring entanglements with departing CEOChesapeake faces enduring entanglements with departing CEOChesapeake's McClendon to get $11.7 mln in cash compensationChesapeake's McClendon to get $11.7 million in cash compensationMcClendon's exit will not solve Chesapeake's problems: KempRPT-Chesapeake faces enduring entanglements with departing CEO Jan 30 Aubrey McClendon will no longer be running Chesapeake Energy Corp come April 1. But he is likely to remain deeply entangled with the company he founded 24 years ago.  RPT-Chesapeake faces enduring entanglements with departing CEO Jan 30 Aubrey McClendon will no longer be running Chesapeake Energy Corp come April 1. But he is likely to remain deeply entangled with the company he founded 24 years ago. LONDON Shareholders must be hoping the removal of Aubrey McClendon as Chesapeake's chief executive will end the corporate governance discount attached to the company's share price and unlock superior returns. They are likely to be disappointed.RPT-Chesapeake faces enduring entanglements with departing CEO Jan 30 Aubrey McClendon will no longer be running Chesapeake Energy Corp come April 1. But he is likely to remain deeply entangled with the company he founded 24 years ago. column2: JPMorgan to raise $150 mln in Taiwan fund to invest in China A shares TAIPEI
column3: Jan 31 JPMorgan Chase & Co' fund unit is expecting to raise up to $150 million in Taiwan to invest in A shares in mainland China
column4: an executive of its Taiwan fund arm said on Thursday
column5: marking the first such fund as cross-strait ties accelerate.

column2: Lockheed F-35 program head to retire WASHINGTON
column3: Jan 31 Tom Burbage
column4: a former Navy fighter pilot who ran Lockheed Martin Corp's F-35 Joint Strike Fighter program for 13 years
column5: plans to retire at the end of March
column6: Lockheed said on Thursday.
